data.title: South African Revenue Service

data.text:
Our newly refurbished Giyani branch is situated in the Government Complex in the city. There is plenty of free parking for taxpayers to park their cars, and the branch is about 1.5 km away from major public transport drop-offs. Our friendly staff are competent in English, Xitsonga, Northern Sotho (Sepedi) and Tshivhenda and our busiest times during Tax Season (1 July – 31 October) are between 08h00 and 14h00. Convenience stores are 3 km away from the branch.

Languages spoken:

English

Afrikaans

Xitsonga

Northern Sotho (Sepedi)

Tshivhenda

Services:

Tax Services

Debt Management: Taxpayers can be assisted with Debt arrangements.

Dedicated Small, Micro and Medium Enterprises (SMME’s) service desk. To qualify as an SMME, you need to be the actual owner with a per annum business turnover of between R0 and R20 million.

Contact Details:

Email Address: [email protected]

Telephone: Call our SARS Contact Centre on

0800 00 7277 (0800 00 SARS)

Business Hours: Weekdays 8:00 – 16:00 and Wednesdays 9:00 – 16:00

Where to park:

There is plenty of free parking for taxpayers to park their cars.
